duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate wafer fabrication tools and processes to produce semiconductor devices according to written procedures and process specifications.
Test manufactured products and deliver them to work areas following safety protocols and procedures.
Recognize and address quality problems on equipment and products, taking appropriate action to resolve issues.
Maintain certification in multiple areas and escalates issues as needed to achieve manufacturing goals.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent or GED. Previous manufacturing experience preferred
